programme.title: The Queens Ball
programme.desc: Racine Robinson is the queen pin of a criminal empire, alongside her daughters Cand and Kat. Racine is celebrating her 50th birthday and invited all the regional crime families to come and celebrate. Unbeknownst to her, a contract has been taking out to kil Racine on her birthday. With government intervention, and various talking heads, the death of Racine could lead to open warfare in the city.

programme.title: The Saved and the Salacious
programme.desc: Ashton, Isaac, and Terrell have dreams of making it big in the gospel music industry, and making an impact in the world; however, worlds collide when they meet the nefarious founder and owner of Titan Records, Rodney "Rod" Wallace.

programme.title: The Killing Secret
programme.desc: The outside looking in, Daniel and his wife Brenda appeared to have it all together, but smiles can be deceiving, and kisses can be poison. A healthy marriage is difficult to attain and destroy, but not when secrets are intertwined in the vows, especially one that can kill.

programme.title: The Calling
programme.desc: Tamar has been called to become a minister, and for most, this would be an honorable moment, but for Tamar, it is the worst thing that could happen. Tamar is the daughter of prominent Deacon Jessup, and is a lesbian. Taught that her desires are not that of God, Tamar has suppressed them for the last 16 years and has never dated a woman. When the Future Minister’s Ministry opens for a new class, Tamar finds herself falling for the only other woman in the class.

programme.title: The Betrayal 3: Neva Ending
programme.desc: Blood is not always thicker than water, and not all friends are as loyal as you think. Four different relationships display love, hurt, and betrayal.

programme.title: The Betrayal 4: Wicked Nights
programme.desc: Wicked days, wicked nights, wicked feelings. Tk & Glizzy won’t rest until one of them controls the city. Following their daily struggles on the streets of Atlanta, we will soon see why the streets are divided & why family means nothing! Blood chaos & mayhem, the kind of betrayal that reminds us that no one can be trusted.

programme.title: Dream on Dreamer
programme.desc: Mario's life unravels when he quits med school for acting, angering his wife, Erica, who leaves with their daughter. His friend Derrick faces his own crisis with his side chick. Desperate, they turn to Mario's drug-dealing brother, Paul. This leads them into the dangerous world of Queen Pin Malkia, where their lives are put at risk.

programme.title: The Games We Play
programme.desc: Married and settled, Beejay and Montez, are so busy that they have not been intimate in months. When Beejay confesses this detail to her girlfriends, they convince her that all men cheat, and that they can prove it.

programme.title: The Perfect Challenge
programme.desc: Alfred & Della Hughes, a successful couple, face marital strife. Alfred's neglect and an affair strain their bond. Della, overwhelmed by household duties, feels undervalued. Their children witness their parents' escalating conflicts, leading to a tumultuous breakdown. Though their children plead for unity, divorce looms. A family intervention, sparked by a heartfelt gift, forces them to confront their deep-seated love and the possibility of reconciliation.

programme.title: Concealment 2: Open Marriage
programme.desc: Deandre & Nia, betrayed by each other & blackmailed by their college friend Isis, reluctantly open their marriage. Isis steals their money & disappears. Deandre seeks help to recover his losses. Both are involved in secret affairs, concealing crucial information from their partners, leading to tragic consequences.

programme.title: Through Sickness and Hell
programme.desc: When a police officer is trapped in a toxic marriage, he must find the strength to break free from his abusive wife, risking his career, reputation, but also his life as he battles the damaging stigma surrounding domestic violence against men.

programme.title: Crush
programme.desc: Haunted by her past, a young woman's life is complicated by love, self-discovery, and surrounding violence.

programme.title: Who is She
programme.desc: Megan is a beautiful woman in search of love and acceptance but masks a tormented soul. Beneath the surface lies a volatile woman with multiple personalities and a dangerous capacity for violence.

programme.title: Apex
programme.desc: A special ops team enters the underground bunker "Hades" to rescue missing scientists, only to uncover a terrifying secret far beyond their expectations.

programme.title: The Price of Fame
programme.desc: In the streets of Atlanta, Cassie, a struggling young woman searching for purpose, meets Ryan, a charismatic interviewer who offers her a chance to step into the world of fame and opportunity. With guidance from her cunning best friend, Ledrick, Cassie navigates the glamorous yet cutthroat entertainment industry. But as hidden agendas and betrayals emerge, Cassie finds herself questioning the cost of her dreams.

programme.title: Finders Keepers
programme.desc: Jaylin is a struggling single father trying to support his children and make ends meet. One day he comes upon a box of pills and tries to sell them for the cash. Until thugs approach him, and now a simple gamble, becomes life threatening.
